name: Wandering Mind
description:
Have you taken a moment to simply look up at the sky? It might have been pink today, you may have missed it. So look up, look down, there is a meaning around.

An open world metaphorical game inspired by the philosophies of Alan Watts. The game is based on the ideology that life is not a journey with an important meaning waiting at its end, but it is like a dance, the road itself is the meaningful experience. The game invites the player to reflect, be present and see the magic there is along the way.

Designers - Romy Dahan, Hen Golan

Developer - Tomer Ben Gigi

Music - Tamir D. Klein

Narrator - Maxim La Lau
